description: Try our easy to follow Rendang Meatball Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rendang Meatball Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine cucumber, tomato, remaining onion, lime juice, oil and coriander in a bowl. Season. Serve curry with rice and sambal.
